text: Fitzhugh L. "Fitz" Fulton, Jr. (June 6, 1925 - February 4, 2015) was an American civilian research pilot at NASA's Dryden Flight Research Center, Edwards, California. He worked at NASA from August 1, 1966 until July 3, 1986. Before working at NASA, Fulton served as a pilot in the U.S. Air Force for 23 years. title: Fitzhugh L. Fulton
